  • "ko" — 한국어
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Max limit is 100.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Access token for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Player account ID. Max limit is 100.
parameters.name: account_id

list.description: Method returns partial list of players. The list is filtered by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Max limit is 100.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description:
Search type. Defines minimum length and type of search. Default value: startswith. Default is startswith. Valid values:

  • "startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Case insensitive. (by default)
  • "exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Minimum length: 1 character. Case insensitive.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Player name search string. Parameter 'type' defines minimum length and type of search. Maximum length: 24 symbols.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, an limit of 100 is applied (by default).
parameters.name: limit

fields.description: Last time that the information about the availability of aircraft in the Hangar was updated. To receive this information, a valid access_token for the specified account is needed.
name: in_garage_updated

fields.description: Availability of aircraft in the Hangar. This data requires a valid access_token for the specified account.
name: in_garage
